example: There is a long distance from the north to the south of South America.
There is thick forest with a lot of rain near the Equator.
South America has large areas of grasslands in the south.
There are big differences in climates and plants because of altitude.
People in South America have lived there since ancient times.
The Inca civilization was built high in the Andes Mountains.
The Inca Empire was strongest in the 15th century.
Europeans came and destroyed the local empire.
Spain and Portugal ruled nearly all of South America.
They brought slaves from Africa to work in plantations.
